mapper.update: update f_graintemp set keyid=keyid ,storageid=#{storageid} ,dim1=#{dim1} ,dim2=#{dim2} ,dim3=#{dim3} ,testdate=#{testdate} ,intemprature=#{intemprature} ,outtemprature=#{outtemprature} ,inhumidity=#{inhumidity} ,outhumidity=#{outhumidity} ,grainwater=#{grainwater} ,temperatureset=#{temperatureset} ,testuser=#{testuser} where keyid=#{keyid}

update f_graintemp set keyid=keyid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,dim1=#{dim1} ,dim2=#{dim2} ,dim3=#{dim3} ,testdate=#{testdate} ,intemprature=#{intemprature} ,outtemprature=#{outtemprature} ,inhumidity=#{inhumidity} ,outhumidity=#{outhumidity} ,grainwater=#{grainwater} ,temperatureset=#{temperatureset} ,testuser=#{testuser} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and dim1=#{Where_dim1} and dim2=#{Where_dim2} and dim3=#{Where_dim3} and testdate=#{Where_testdate} and intemprature=#{Where_intemprature} and outtemprature=#{Where_outtemprature} and inhumidity=#{Where_inhumidity} and outhumidity=#{Where_outhumidity} and grainwater=#{Where_grainwater} and temperatureset=#{Where_temperatureset} and testuser=#{Where_testuser} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.dim1 "dim1", t.dim2 "dim2", t.dim3 "dim3", t.testdate "testdate", t.intemprature "intemprature", t.outtemprature "outtemprature", t.inhumidity "inhumidity", t.outhumidity "outhumidity", t.grainwater "grainwater", t.temperatureset "temperatureset", t.testuser "testuser", t.createtime "createtime", lg.grainname "grainname" from f_graintemp t left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=ls.defgrainid where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.dim1 "dim1", t.dim2 "dim2", t.dim3 "dim3", t.testdate "testdate", t.intemprature "intemprature", t.outtemprature "outtemprature", t.inhumidity "inhumidity", t.outhumidity "outhumidity", t.grainwater "grainwater", t.temperatureset "temperatureset", t.testuser "testuser", t.createtime "createtime" from f_graintemp t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.dim1=#{dim1} and t.dim2=#{dim2} and t.dim3=#{dim3} and t.testdate=#{testdate} and t.intemprature=#{intemprature} and t.outtemprature=#{outtemprature} and t.inhumidity=#{inhumidity} and t.outhumidity=#{outhumidity} and t.grainwater=#{grainwater} and t.temperatureset=#{temperatureset} and t.testuser=#{testuser} and t.createtime=#{createtime}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.dim1 "dim1", t.dim2 "dim2", t.dim3 "dim3", t.testdate "testdate", t.intemprature "intemprature", t.outtemprature "outtemprature", t.inhumidity "inhumidity", t.outhumidity "outhumidity", t.grainwater "grainwater", t.temperatureset "temperatureset", t.testuser "testuser", t.createtime "createtime" from f_graintemp t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.dim1=#{dim1} and t.dim2=#{dim2} and t.dim3=#{dim3} and t.testdate=#{testdate} and t.intemprature=#{intemprature} and t.outtemprature=#{outtemprature} and t.inhumidity=#{inhumidity} and t.outhumidity=#{outhumidity} and t.grainwater=#{grainwater} and t.temperatureset=#{temperatureset} and t.testuser=#{testuser} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
mapper.delete: delete from f_graintemp where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and dim1=#{Where_dim1} and dim2=#{Where_dim2} and dim3=#{Where_dim3} and testdate=#{Where_testdate} and intemprature=#{Where_intemprature} and outtemprature=#{Where_outtemprature} and inhumidity=#{Where_inhumidity} and outhumidity=#{Where_outhumidity} and grainwater=#{Where_grainwater} and temperatureset=#{Where_temperatureset} and testuser=#{Where_testuser} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.dim1 "dim1", t.dim2 "dim2", t.dim3 "dim3", t.testdate "testdate", t.intemprature "intemprature", t.outtemprature "outtemprature", t.inhumidity "inhumidity", t.outhumidity "outhumidity", t.grainwater "grainwater", t.temperatureset "temperatureset", t.testuser "testuser", t.createtime "createtime", ls.storagename "storagename" from f_graintemp t left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.dim1=#{dim1} and t.dim2=#{dim2} and t.dim3=#{dim3} and t.testdate=#{testdate} and t.intemprature=#{intemprature} and t.outtemprature=#{outtemprature} and t.inhumidity=#{inhumidity} and t.outhumidity=#{outhumidity} and t.grainwater=#{grainwater} and t.temperatureset=#{temperatureset} and t.testuser=#{testuser} and t.createtime=#{createtime}

select count(*) from f_graintemp t left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.dim1=#{dim1} and t.dim2=#{dim2} and t.dim3=#{dim3} and t.testdate=#{testdate} and t.intemprature=#{intemprature} and t.outtemprature=#{outtemprature} and t.inhumidity=#{inhumidity} and t.outhumidity=#{outhumidity} and t.grainwater=#{grainwater} and t.temperatureset=#{temperatureset} and t.testuser=#{testuser} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
